mapper.sql: id AS "id", type AS "type", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", m_unit AS "mUnit", lattice_mouth_type AS "latticeMouthType", data_state AS "dataState", create_time AS "createTime", sort_type AS "sortType",package_type AS "packageType",package_number AS "packageNumber",turnover_type AS "turnoverType",turnover_lattice_type AS "turnoverLatticeType",label AS "label"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_material_type where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and lattice_mouth_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeMouthType},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select
from wms_material_type where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and lattice_mouth_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeMouthType},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

SELECT wmt.*,wiclt.type_name,wmsp.packge_name AS packageType FROM `wms_material_type` AS wmt LEFT JOIN wms_intelligent_cabinet1_lattice_type AS wiclt ON wmt.lattice_mouth_type=wiclt.id LEFT JOIN wms_packinfo AS wmsp ON wmt.package_type = wmsp.id where 1 = 1
and wmt.id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and wmt.type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and wmt.material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and wmt.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wmt.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wmt.m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and wmt.lattice_mouth_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeMouthType},'%')
and wmt.data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and wmt.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and wmt.label like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.label},'%')

select
from wms_material_type where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and lattice_mouth_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeMouthType},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select id as "id", `type` as "type", case `type` when 1 then "工具" else "备品备件" end as typeEx, material_name as "materialName", material_sku as "materialSku", sort_type as "sortType", turnover_type as "turnoverType" from wms_material_type where 1=1 and id = #{id};

select
from wms_material_type where 1 = 1 and material_sku = #{paramCondition.materialSku} limit 1
